title: Things You Might Hear, Team Losing Excuses, Ask Steve, MTH, Phrases To Avoid At Thanksgiving, Drive Thru Workers, Comedy Roulette, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Things You Might Hear, Team Losing Excuses, Ask Steve, MTH, Phrases To Avoid At Thanksgiving, Drive Thru Workers, Comedy Roulette, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Happy Thanksgiving! The crew talks about the things you might hear at a "black" holiday party. The fellas talk about the things losers say when their team loses. Uncle Steve answers random questions from the crew. Fool #2 does an original track for Murder The Hit. Thanksgiving should be a time for peace and the crew has phrases that you should not say at the dinner table. We here at The Steve Harvey Morning Show got nothing but love for drive thru workers. Comedy Roulette talks about the signs that remind you that you're lost. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog has a message for those that want better for their life and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
